allow:
Bash(python -c "
import asyncio
import sys
sys.path.insert(0, ''src'')

from tencent_cloud_search_mcp.server import TencentCloudSearchServer

async def test_server():
    server = TencentCloudSearchServer()
    
    try:
        # 测试_handle_search函数
        arguments = {''query'': ''测试搜索'', ''limit'': 5}
        result = await server._handle_search(arguments)
        
        print(''✅ _handle_search调用成功'')
        print(''结果类型:'', type(result))
        print(''结果:'', result)
        print(''内容类型:'', type(result.content))
        print(''第一个content:'', result.content[0] if result.content else ''None'')
        
    except Exception as e:
        print(''❌ 测试失败:'', e)
        import traceback
        traceback.print_exc()

asyncio.run(test_server())
")
